title: Response Schema for the Ad Groups Mutate Operation of GoogleAds
description: Schema representing the output of the ad groups mutate operation in GoogleAds API

partialFailureError.description: Errors that pertain to operation failures in the partial failure mode.

resourceName.description: The resource name of the ad.
The resource name of the ad

type.description: The type of the ad group.

adRotationMode.description: The ad rotation mode of the ad group.

urlCustomParameters.description: The list of mappings used to substitute custom parameter tags.

optimizedTargetingEnabled.description: Optimized Targeting is the replacement for Audience Expansion.

excludeDemographicExpansion.description: Excludes demographics from expanded targeting when optimized targeting is enabled; ignored otherwise.

targetingSetting.description: The targeting setting of the ad group.

displayCustomBidDimension.description: Provides aggregated view into why an ad group ad is not serving or not serving optimally.

audienceSetting.description: The audience setting of the ad group.

primaryStatus.description: Provides aggregated view into why an ad group is not serving or not serving optimally.

id.description: he ID of the ad group.

name.description: The name of the ad group.

campaign.description: The campaign to which the ad group belongs.

baseAdGroup.description: This field is the resource name of the base ad group from which this ad group was created.

trackingUrlTemplate.description: The URL template for constructing a tracking URL.

percentCpcBidMicros.description: The percent cpc bid amount, expressed as a fraction of the advertised price for some good or service.

finalUrlSuffix.description: URL template for appending params to Final URL.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
